name: Table
description: Tabular presentation of data from an array

properties.label: Caption
properties.name: caption
properties.help: Describing the content of a data table. To be accessible the description must be relevant (clear and concise).

properties.label: Interpret HTML
properties.name: allowHTML
properties.help: If you choose 'no', HTML code will be escaped instead of being interpreted in row's cells. If you choose ‘Yes’, this could potentially lead to HTML injections attacks. Please take into account these risks.

properties.label: Headers
properties.name: headers
properties.caption: Comma-separated list
properties.help: If you specify an expression, the result must be an array of strings

properties.label: Content
properties.name: content
properties.help: Array used to populate the table. Can be a list of objects. Use 'Column keys' to refine content

properties.label: Column keys
properties.name: columnsKey
properties.caption: Use Filters to format the data (e.g. columnKey|uiDate)
properties.help: When 'Content' is a list of objects, specifies the attributes to display in the table columns. These keys must not be a number, or start with a number

properties.label: Bordered
properties.name: bordered
properties.help: Add borders all around the table and between all the columns.
